annotation.spannedText: Due to the success of immunization programs, the incidence of vaccine-preventable infectious diseases has declined

classMention.mentionClass: Due to the success of immunization programs, the incidence of vaccine-preventable infectious diseases has declined

annotation.spannedText: individuals are less aware of the serious consequences of vaccine preventable illnesses

classMention.mentionClass: individuals are less aware of the serious consequences of vaccine preventable illnesses

annotation.spannedText: While vaccines are extremely safe and effective, no medical product is 100 percent safe or effective

classMention.mentionClass: While vaccines are extremely safe and effective, no medical product is 100 percent safe or effective

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines have been proven, over decades, to be one of the safest and most powerful disease prevention tools available

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines have been proven, over decades, to be one of the safest and most powerful disease prevention tools available

annotation.spannedText: Today there are far fewer visible reminders of the suffering, injuries, and premature deaths caused by diseases that can now be prevented with vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: Today there are far fewer visible reminders of the suffering, injuries, and premature deaths caused by diseases that can now be prevented with vaccines

annotation.spannedText: Immunization programs optimally prevent the threat of dangerous infectious diseases that threaten the lives of our citizens, especially the Nation's children and elderly

classMention.mentionClass: Immunization programs optimally prevent the threat of dangerous infectious diseases that threaten the lives of our citizens, especially the Nation's children and elderly

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are among the 20th century's most successful and cost-effective public health tools for preventing disease, disability, and death

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are among the 20th century's most successful and cost-effective public health tools for preventing disease, disability, and death

annotation.spannedText: Protecting a child through immunization is a parent's decision, taken in discussion with their doctor

classMention.mentionClass: Protecting a child through immunization is a parent's decision, taken in discussion with their doctor

annotation.spannedText: because of vaccination, the number of cases of these infections has been decreased by about 96% to 100%

classMention.mentionClass: because of vaccination, the number of cases of these infections has been decreased by about 96% to 100%

annotation.spannedText: if vaccination rates decrease, the number of cases of infection will increase

classMention.mentionClass: if vaccination rates decrease, the number of cases of infection will increase
